dcterms:creator: A. Dosovitskiy

dcterms:description: CARLA is an open urban driving simulator that provides a complex environment for training and validating autonomous driving policies, featuring multi-agent dynamics, pedestrians, intersections, and changing weather conditions.
dcterms:title: CARLA

dcterms:creator: Felipe Codevilla
Eder Santana
Antonio López
Adrien Gaidon
dcterms:description: The NoCrash Benchmark is designed to evaluate the performance of autonomous driving agents in complex scenarios, focusing on collision avoidance in various traffic conditions.
dcterms:title: NoCrash Benchmark

dcterms:creator: E. Espié
Christophe Guionneau
Bernhard Wymann
Christos Dimitrakakis
Rémi Coulom
Andrew Sumner
dcterms:description: TORCS is an open racing car simulator that allows for the development and testing of autonomous driving algorithms in a racing environment.
dcterms:title: TORCS
